actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: Concurrent resolution disapproving certain regulations of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: States that the Congress finds that sections 86.37 (c) and 86.41 of the regulations of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare relating to non-discrimination on the basis of sex in education programs and activities receiving Federal fianancial assistance exceed the authority conferred by title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972. Disapproves such sections of such regulations in that they seek to regulate athletic programs and activities which receive no Federal financial assistance.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution disapproving certain regulations of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare.
